body_html: Do we expect them to copy/paste entire code blobs into that textarea field? Why do we not consider external links? If the code exercise is mainly for the mentors, they will hardly be able to blindly select people anyway, right?
body_text: Do we expect them to copy/paste entire code blobs into that textarea field? Why do we not consider external links? If the code exercise is mainly for the mentors, they will hardly be able to blindly select people anyway, right?
body: Do we expect them to copy/paste entire code blobs into that textarea field? Why do we not consider external links? If the code exercise is mainly for the mentors, they will hardly be able to blindly select people anyway, right?
